entity.name: The White House
entity.description: Conversation from and about the White House, both as a destination and as political voice

text: @realDonaldTrump @WhiteHouse I am very glad that you are still healthy, and so is your family from this Coronavirus. And have been the whole time. You have done a great job Mr. President also with the Pandemic Team,  and the Economic Recovery Team. Your a Great Leader for our Country.  Trump 2020
